resources.string:
App Name : Batroid

 Version : 1.0

 Category : Android Personal Assistant

 Author : Abhishek Zambre, Mayank Khullar, Chaitanya Phalak, Murali Ravivarma

 Course : Mobile Computing (CSE 535)

 Class : Master of Computer Science (MCS), Arizona State University

 Description : Batroid is a smart Android Personal Assistant, which silences your phone when you are in a meeting or any DND zone. It gives you whether updates based on your current location. It auto-replies to text messages. It sends birthday wishes to your contacts on their birthdays. It pro-actively gives you directions before meetings.
